notes: This is a spacious, modern apartment in excellent condition with contemporary finishes including wooden flooring, track lighting, and a well-equipped kitchen with counter seating. The living area features large windows providing good natural light and city views. For baby safety, note the open balcony with glass railings visible in images, and the kitchen has an open layout with a bar counter that may need childproofing. The space appears very clean and well-maintained with a neutral color palette.
